snippet.title: JOLT - Journal of Online Learning and Teaching
snippet.description: * JOLT - Journal of Online Learning and Teaching (clueweb12-0002wb-82-32158) http://jolt.merlot.org/vol4no3/glass_0908.htm ...94542 USA Valerie.Sue@csueastbay.edu Abstract This study analyzes student preference, satisfaction and perceived learning in an online college mathematics course for business majors. Using a combination of active and passive learning objects, the online course was developed to investigate the instructional strategies students use the most, prefer and believe impact their learning. Students answered weekly surveys about the course. They were asked to report their usage of the learning objects and... [cached version]
